params.name: copy
params.comment: Whether to make a copy of the input data.

params.name: with_mean
params.comment: Whether to center the data before scaling.

params.name: with_std
params.comment: Whether to scale the data to unit variance.

params.name: feature_range
params.comment: The desired range of transformed data.

params.name: copy
params.comment: Whether to make a copy of the input data.

params.name: clip
params.comment: Whether to clip the transformed data to the feature range.
